translations: n.截面，节段；型材（section 的复数）
v.把……切成片；把……作成截面（section 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: Sections of the structure have been left unsupported.
sentences.translation: 这个结构有几部分没有支撑。

sentences.sentence: Treat all the sections that have been starred as priority.
sentences.translation: 要优先处理所有标星号的部分。

sentences.sentence: The report can be conveniently divided into three main sections.
sentences.translation: 这份报告不用费事就可划分为三个主要部分。
